snippet: A.I.G. must win a court fight with an entity run by the New York Fed, which the insurer says is blocking its efforts to go after banks that harmed it financially.
abstract: American International Group is seeking approval to be able to sue other banks that sold it mortgage-backed securities that plunged in value during the financial crisis, but must first win a court fight with an entity controlled by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York to do so; says the entity is blocking its efforts to pursue the banks that caused it financial harm.
lead_paragraph: A.I.G. must win a court fight with an entity run by the New York Fed, which the insurer says is blocking its efforts to go after banks that harmed it financially.

headline.seo: A.I.G. Seeks Ability to Sue More Banks Over Mortgage Securities
headline.main: A.I.G. Seeks Approval to File More Bank Suits
headline.print_headline: A.I.G. Seeks Approval To File More Bank Suits

keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York
keywords.name: organizations
